modName: Dark Brotherhood More Black Armour and Robes
summary: A replacement of the red parts on the armour with black.
descriptionHtml:
Follow these instructions
1. Extract the \"Armor\" folder into your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\ for the brotherhood armour.
2. Extract the \"Clothes\" folder into your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures. 

NOTE: if you already have other textures downloaded and already have the \"Armor\" and \"clothes\" folder, do not extract those folders. Simply open them up and extract the folder from inside into the right folder. For example the \"dbarmor\" folder into \"armor\"
author: dimi616
